info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards

  • Classes in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards used by info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.dao 
    Class and Description
    Reward
    The super class of all rewards.
  • Classes in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards used by info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities 
    Class and Description
    Achievement
    The achievement class contains an image and a description for a documentary use to track significant results or milestones the player was able to achieve during her/his play.
    Badge
    The badge class serves as a Reward-subclass that represents a distinct icon.
    PermanentReward
    Permanent rewards are rewards that can be earned only once.
  • Classes in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards used by info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.goal 
    Class and Description
    Reward
    The super class of all rewards.
  • Classes in info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards used by info.interactivesystems.gamificationengine.entities.rewards 
    Class and Description
    PermanentReward
    Permanent rewards are rewards that can be earned only once.
    Reward
    The super class of all rewards.
    VolatileReward
    A volatile reward is a reward that can be awarded more than one time.
